name: AddPlayerClassEx
notes: The maximum class ID is 319 (starting from 0, so a total of 320 classes). When this limit is reached, any more classes that are added will replace ID 319.
description: This function is exactly the same as the AddPlayerClass function, with the addition of a team parameter.
params_title: (teamid, modelid, Float:spawn_x, Float:spawn_y, Float:spawn_z, Float:z_angle, weapon1, weapon1_ammo, weapon2, weapon2_ammo, weapon3, weapon3_ammo)

params_body.name: teamid
params_body.description: The team you want the player to spawn in.

params_body.name: modelid
params_body.description: The skin which the player will spawn with.

params_body.name: Float:spawn_x
params_body.description: The X coordinate of the class' spawn position.

params_body.name: Float:spawn_y
params_body.description: The Y coordinate of the class' spawn position.

params_body.name: Float:spawn_z
params_body.description: The Z coordinate of the class' spawn position.

params_body.name: Float:z_angle
params_body.description: The direction in which the player will face after spawning.

params_body.name: weapon1
params_body.description: The first spawn-weapon for the player.

params_body.name: weapon1_ammo
params_body.description: The amount of ammunition for the first spawn weapon.

params_body.name: weapon2
params_body.description: The second spawn-weapon for the player.

params_body.name: weapon2_ammo
params_body.description: The amount of ammunition for the second spawn weapon.

params_body.name: weapon3
params_body.description: The third spawn-weapon for the player.

params_body.name: weapon3_ammo
params_body.description: The amount of ammunition for the third spawn weapon.

return_values:
The ID of the class which was just added.

 319 if the class limit (320) was reached. The highest possible class ID is 319.
related_fn:
AddPlayerClass: Add a class.
 SetSpawnInfo: Set the spawn setting for a player.
 SetPlayerTeam: Set a player's team.
 SetPlayerSkin: Set a player's skin.
